issue.title: [Python] Document use of int96 timestamps and options in Parquet docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4047](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4047). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is not mentioned in the prose docs; it would be helpful for people who are using systems requiring int96 timestamps (e.g. Impala/Redshift Spectrum) to have this
